be.ac.kuleuven.cs.ips2.project2002.logicCircuits
Interface DemoUpdateListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
public interface DemoUpdateListener
extends java.util.EventListener

Instances of this type are warned by the LogicCircuit they are registered with when it begins the proces of changing its boolean value, and when it ends that process. This is for demonstration purposes.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Jan Dockx

Method Summary
 void valueUpdateCompleted(LogicCircuit updatedCircuit)
          This method will be called by the LogicCircuit this is registered with when it completes the proces of changing its boolean value.
 void valueUpdateStarted(LogicCircuit updatingCircuit)
